p: The microhardness results are depicted in Figure 6. It was observed that CX light-cured using the Mylar matrix (Group A) had significantly lower hardness values (570 MPa) (p<0.01 vs Group B, p<0.0001 vs Group C, p<0.0001 vs Group D) compared to all the specimens light-cured in different polymerization conditions. Regarding XTE, the best performance was achieved in argon-rich atmosphere (812 MPa) (Group C) compared to mylar (Group A) (p<0.001) and air (Group D) (p<0.01). Significant differences were found between CX and XTE light-cured under mylar matrix (Groups A) (p<0.001).
